Uses of Interface
us.pserver.remote.SocketChannelFactory

  • Packages that use SocketChannelFactory 
    Package Description
    us.pserver.remote  

    • Uses of SocketChannelFactory in us.pserver.remote

      Methods in us.pserver.remote that return SocketChannelFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SocketChannelFactory NetworkServer.getChannelFactory()
      Retorna a fábrica do canal de comunicação de objetos na rede.
      static SocketChannelFactory DefaultFactoryProvider.getHttpResponseChannelFactory()
      Cria uma fábrica de canais do tipo HttpResponseChannel.
      static SocketChannelFactory DefaultFactoryProvider.getSocketXmlChannelFactory()
      Cria uma fábrica de canais do tipo XmlNetChannel.
      Methods in us.pserver.remote with parameters of type SocketChannelFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetworkServer NetworkServer.setChannelFactory(SocketChannelFactory fact)
      Define a fábrica do canal de comunicação de objetos na rede.
      Constructors in us.pserver.remote with parameters of type SocketChannelFactory 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkServer(ObjectContainer cont, NetConnector netCon, SocketChannelFactory fact)
      Construtor que recebe como argumentos o container de objetos ObjectContainer, as informações de conexão de rede NetConnector e a fábrica do canal de comunicação de objetos na rede.
